channel.title: 508 model help!
channel.description:
hi guys :) i made this model earlier. when im dopping it it's looking like it should .. when i look at it in inventory it looks like it should :D BUT.. when i wear it, im getting a cls kinda looking model :S and not the sword i wanted :S how do i fix this :D ?
inits r thiese case 84: class19.aRSStringArray340[1] = Class112.method1668(43, "Wear"); class19.anInt330 = 50001;//inventory/drop model class19.anInt336 = 900;//model zoom class19.anInt389 = 245;//modelRotation1 class19.anInt395 = 30;// model rotation 2 class19.anInt358 = 1;// model offset 1 class19.anInt391 = 3;// model offset 2 class19.anInt390 = 50002;//Male model id class19.anInt347 = -1;//male sleeves class19.anInt344 = -1;//women sleeves class19.anInt387 = 50002;//female model id class19.aRSString_362 = Class112.method1668(43, "War sword");//Item Name break;
and the equip model is 50002 .. :S please help me guys :)
EDIT!!!: now im just going invisible :S help guys please!

item.title: 508 model help!
item.dc:creator: @klump klump
item.description:
@klump wrote:

hi guys i made this model earlier.
when im dopping it it’s looking like it should … when i look at it in inventory it looks like it should BUT… when i wear it, im getting a cls kinda looking model :S and not the sword i wanted :S how do i fix this ?

inits r thiese
case 84:
class19.aRSStringArray340[1] = Class112.method1668(43, “Wear”);
class19.anInt330 = 50001;//inventory/drop model
class19.anInt336 = 900;//model zoom
class19.anInt389 = 245;//modelRotation1
class19.anInt395 = 30;// model rotation 2
class19.anInt358 = 1;// model offset 1
class19.anInt391 = 3;// model offset 2
class19.anInt390 = 50002;//Male model id
class19.anInt347 = -1;//male sleeves
class19.anInt344 = -1;//women sleeves
class19.anInt387 = 50002;//female model id
class19.aRSString_362 = Class112.method1668(43, “War sword”);//Item Name
break;

and the equip model is 50002 … :S
please help me guys

EDIT!!!: now im just going invisible :S help guys please!

Read full topic
